title: Secluded Seafront Elegance on Malaysia's East Coast with Decadent Dining
description:
Cloaked in a canopy of lush jungle and fronted by the South China Sea, Tanjong Jara Resort is an elegant sanctuary that overlooks the pristine beaches of Malaysia's secluded East Coast. Savour the old-world charm of 17th-century Malay palaces and relax in one of the beautifully crafted sea-view rooms.

Enjoy ultimate beachside seclusion with daily breakfast, one two-course Malay dining experience and a 50-minute massage to share.
offer_address: Batu 8, Off Jalan Dungun, 23000 Kuala Dungun, Terengganu

title: Secluded Coastal Elegance: Enjoy Exotic Dining Experiences
description: Channelling the old-world charm of 17th century Malay palaces, the award-winning Tanjong Jara Resort sits on the pristine east coast of Peninsular Malaysia offering laid-back elegance to its guests. Indulge in five or seven nights in a sea-view room and enjoy ultimate beachside seclusion adorned with five-star luxury with daily buffet breakfast, nightly dining experiences, nightly drinks, two 50-minute massages to share, private return airport transfers and more.
offer_address: Batu 8, Off Jalan Dungun, 23000 Kuala Dungun, Terengganu

title: Secluded Coastal Elegance with Exotic Dining Experiences & Nightly Drinks
description: Channelling the old-world charm of 17th century Malay palaces, the award-winning Tanjong Jara Resort sits on the pristine east coast of Peninsular Malaysia, offering laid-back elegance to its guests. Enjoy ultimate beachside seclusion adorned with five-star luxury with daily buffet breakfast, two multi-course dinners, nightly drinks, a 50-minute massage per person and a Malay cooking experience followed by lunch.
offer_address: Batu 8, Off Jalan Dungun, 23000 Kuala Dungun, Terengganu

title: Malaysia East Coast Secluded Beachfront Sanctuary
description:
Cloaked in a canopy of lush jungle and fronted by emerald waters, Tanjong Jara Resort is an elegant East Coast sanctuary. Blissfully positioned between rainforests and untouched beaches in the secluded area of Dungun, this paradise is a scenic four-hour drive from Kuala Lumpur.

Inspired by the old-world charm of 17th-century Malay palaces, this coastal retreat offers the ultimate indulgent experience. With two gorgeous outdoor swimming pools, a rejuvenating Spa Village, three bars and restaurants, two tennis courts, watersports, and a multitude of cultural activities and trips - from turtle watching and eco-river cruises, to bicycle tours and jungle trekking - the opportunities to unwind are endless.
offer_address: Batu 8, Off Jalan Dungun, 23000 Kuala Dungun, Terengganu
